entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 11:30 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
